BR_text.BRsummary: Flake8 error while executing "make codestyle" command
BR_text.BRdescription:
Description:
 Command "make codestyle" exits with flake8 error: "no such option: --inline-quotes".
 To reproduce:
 
 Install flake8, version 3.7.8.
 Run "make codestyle" in root of catalyst repository on HEAD if master remote branch.
 
 Expected:
 Codestyle checked successfully with no errors from flake8.
 
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7341001/66612377-4c726f80-ebca-11e9-8301-bb68718807fe.png></denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
Hi, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Arquestro>@Arquestro</denchmark-link>
 
 Thanks for reporting! Could you please pip install -r ./requirements/requirements-dev.txt? We have additional flake extensions for code-style check :)
 Somehow, we have just forgot to add this like to contribution guide. Is it okay for you to check pip install and make a PR with contribution guide update? As a person, who have just passed this relevant experience you could propose better vision of docs update.

comments_1.comment_text: Thanks for update, ill check it and do my best :)
